title: Constraint Decides Winner Invariant
summary: The winner is determined by which tool fails first under the locked persona constraint.
what_this_is: Defines the invariant decision logic across all comparisons to enforce inevitability through constraint-driven failure.
structural_problem: Without a dominant invariant, comparisons degrade into feature lists or subjective preferences that do not scale.
rule: Every verdict must resolve as a failure-first outcome under the locked persona constraint.
tradeoff: Comparisons lacking inevitable failure logic are excluded.
failure_mode: Verdicts become debatable, pages homogenize, and structural differentiation collapses.
structural_impact: All generation, triage, gates, and tools must preserve constraint-first failure as the root decision rule.
